preprocess Module¶

class preprocess.Process(sent)[source]¶

Methods

geolocate(username)[source]¶

Function to pull location information from a sentence. The location is then passed to the geonames_api to obtain latitude and longitudes for each event.

Returns :

lat : latitude coordinate

lon : longitude coordinate
num_involved()[source]¶

Function to obtain information regarding the number of individuals involved in a given event.

Returns :number : number of people involved in an event. Integer.
